name: Daedalight
description:
Daedalight is a First-Person labyrinth-game based on new changing materials mechanics.
You need to find the exit of a maze using a special-type of vizor.

When you gets the first one, blue walls are blocking him to find the proper exit.
You will need to find three different vizors, each one displaying a different maze in the colors of the vizor itselfs (blue, red and then green).

Scroll the mouse wheel to change your vizor in special areas.

Made by :

Aurélien DAVID - Amaury HAULER - Léo NOEL

Have fun!
